name: India Chaat House and restaurant
address: 1148 Davie St, Vancouver, BC V6E 1N1, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Pav Bhaji
hasMenuItem.description: A hearty vegetable curry topped with butter, garnished with chopped onions and cilantro, served with two soft bread rolls and a lime wedge.

hasMenuItem.name: Golgappa (8 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy hollow puris filled with tangy tamarind water, spicy potato filling, and topped with sev.

hasMenuItem.name: Sev Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy puris topped with sev, chopped beets, fresh cilantro, and tangy tamarind chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Chole Bhature
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy chickpeas served with deep-fried bread; a delightful Indian classic, often eaten as breakfast

hasMenuItem.name: Tadka Maggi
hasMenuItem.description: Tadka Maggi combines stir-fried onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies with Maggi noodles, seasoned with Indian herbs for a savory snack.

hasMenuItem.name: Bhel Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Savory Indian street snack bursting with flavorful ingredients like puffed rice, tangy chutneys, and mixed vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Papdi Chaat
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy wafers topped with potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, and tangy tamarind chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Bread Pakora (2 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Bread pakora consists of bread slices filled with spiced potatoes, coated in gram flour batter, and deep-fried, typically served in pairs.

hasMenuItem.name: Dahi Batata Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy puris filled with potatoes and chickpeas, topped with yogurt, tamarind, and mint chutneys, garnished with sev and fresh coriander.

hasMenuItem.name: Samosa Chaat with - Chole (2 Samosa)
hasMenuItem.description: Two samosas filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served atop a bed of chole (chickpea curry), typically garnished with onions, tomatoes, and a drizzle of yogurt and chutneys.

hasMenuItem.name: Chow Mein & Manchurian Mix
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried noodles combined with vegetable Manchurian balls, seasoned with a blend of Indian and Chinese sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Jeera Aloo Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Potatoes seasoned with cumin and other spices, served alongside deep-fried, puffed wheat bread (puri).

hasMenuItem.name: Tikki - Samosa Chaat with Chole

hasMenuItem.name: Bread Chole Kulcha
hasMenuItem.description: Kulcha bread filled with a savory mix of chickpeas, typically accompanied by onions, tomatoes, and a blend of spices, served with a side of chole curry.

hasMenuItem.name: Dahi Batata Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy puris filled with potatoes and chickpeas, topped with yogurt, tamarind, and mint chutneys, garnished with sev and fresh coriander.

hasMenuItem.description: Crispy papdi and soft lentil bhalla topped with boiled chickpeas, potatoes, drizzled with yogurt, tamarind, and mint chutneys, garnished with fresh cilantro and sev.

hasMenuItem.name: Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy golden potato strips, perfectly seasoned and fried to a mouthwatering perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Veg Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Assorted vegetables dipped in a spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried.

hasMenuItem.name: Tikki Chaat with Chole (2 Tikki)

hasMenuItem.name: Chili Fries
hasMenuItem.description: French fries tossed with spicy chili sauce and topped with melted cheese, typically includes onions and bell peppers for added flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Noodle Kulcha
hasMenuItem.description: Kulcha bread filled with stir-fried noodles, often accompanied by a blend of spices and vegetables, offering a unique twist on traditional Indian street food.

hasMenuItem.name: Noodle Burger

hasMenuItem.name: Noodle Burger with Tikki
hasMenuItem.description: A noodle burger with tikki combines a toasted bun, spiced noodle patty, and a crispy potato tikki, typically dressed with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of mint and tamarind sauces.

hasMenuItem.description: Yogurt-soaked lentil balls, topped with spices and tangy tamarind chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Mixed Raita

hasMenuItem.name: Golgappe Water

hasMenuItem.description: Assorted Indian condiments: tangy chutney, spicy pickled achaar, and smooth butter served with warm naan.

hasMenuItem.name: Raita

hasMenuItem.name: Bhatura
hasMenuItem.description: Airy, deep-fried leavened bread, a classic Indian delight.

hasMenuItem.name: House Special Faluda Drink
hasMenuItem.description: A signature blend of rose syrup, vermicelli, sweet basil seeds, and milk, typically garnished with a scoop of ice cream and nuts.

review.reviewBody: the flavors were delicious, but it was really light on the Paneer.  I like ordering so I have food for a couple of days, and the paneer was only enough for one meal for one person.

Very overpriced and the food is not good. I ordered Noodle burge with tiki and it was $17 with only noodles and tikki in a bun ...nothing on side, no sauces, and i ordered Maaza and they sent a very small serving for $4.99
Overpriced. It cost $17 for this Noodle Burger with Tikki and no fries or anything on the side. And its NOT $17 good
I had ordered Amritsari Chef's Special Kulcha and could not taste it as the store missed this item for my delivery.
